long_description: Ideal for summer camping, music festivals and jumping into after snowboarding and surfing, the Poler The Napsack Sleeping Bag has zip armholes and a cinch at the feet so you can wear it like a coat. Hike it up to your waist, cinch it and wear it like a puffy coat around the campfire, and then crawl right back in your tent without having to leave the warmth of your bag. Polyester insulation is rated to keep you warm down to about 50degF. Soft polyester fabric feels great next to skin. Chest pocket fits a phone and has a pass-through hole for your headphones to run internally; has 2 hand pockets. Medium size of the Poler The Napsack Sleeping Bag packs down to about 8 x 18 in. in the included stuff sack for easy transportation to and from the campsite.
